Browse the source code of codebrowser/source/externals/clhep/include/CLHEP/Geometry/Plane3D.h

1// -*- C++ -*-
2// ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
3//
4// This file is a part of the CLHEP - a Class Library for High Energy Physics.
5//
6// History:
7// 22.09.96 E.Chernyaev - initial version
8// 19.10.96 J.Allison - added == and <<.
9// 15.04.03 E.Chernyaev - CLHEP-1.9: template version
10
11#ifndef HEP_PLANE3D_H
12#define HEP_PLANE3D_H
13
14#include <iosfwd>
15#include "CLHEP/Geometry/Point3D.h"
16#include "CLHEP/Geometry/Normal3D.h"
17#include "CLHEP/Geometry/Transform3D.h"
18
19namespace HepGeom {
20
21 /**
22 * Template class for geometrical plane in 3D.
23 *
24 * @author Evgeni Chernyaev <Evgueni.Tcherniaev@cern.ch>
25 * @ingroup geometry
26 */
27 template<class T>
28 class Plane3D {
29 protected:
30 T a_, b_, c_, d_;
31
32 public:
33 /**
34 * Default constructor - creates plane z=0. */
35 Plane3D() : a_(0.), b_(0.), c_(1.), d_(0.) {}
36
37 /**
38 * Constructor from four numbers - creates plane a*x+b*y+c*z+d=0. */
39 Plane3D(T a1, T b1, T c1, T d1) : a_(a1), b_(b1), c_(c1), d_(d1) {}
40
41 /**
42 * Constructor from normal and point. */
43 Plane3D(const Normal3D<T> & n, const Point3D<T> & p)
44 : a_(n.x()), b_(n.y()), c_(n.z()), d_(-n*p) {}
45
46 /**
47 * Constructor from three points. */
48 Plane3D(const Point3D<T> & p1,
49 const Point3D<T> & p2,
50 const Point3D<T> & p3) {
51 Normal3D<T> n = (p2-p1).cross(p3-p1);
52 a_ = n.x(); b_ = n.y(); c_ = n.z(); d_ = -n*p1;
53 }
54
55 /** Copy constructor.
56 * Plane3D<double> has two constructors:
57 * from Plane3D<double> (provided by compiler) and
58 * from Plane3D<float> (defined in this file).
59 * Plane3D<float> has only the last one.
60 */
61 Plane3D(const Plane3D<float> & p)
62 : a_(p.a_), b_(p.b_), c_(p.c_), d_(p.d_) {}
63
64 /**
65 * Destructor. */
66 ~Plane3D() {};
67
68 /**
69 * Assignment. */
70 Plane3D<T> & operator=(const Plane3D<T> & p) {
71 a_ = p.a_; b_ = p.b_; c_ = p.c_; d_ = p.d_; return *this;
72 }
73
74 /**
75 * Returns the a-coefficient in the plane equation: a*x+b*y+c*z+d=0. */
76 T a() const { return a_; }
77 /**
78 * Returns the b-coefficient in the plane equation: a*x+b*y+c*z+d=0. */
79 T b() const { return b_; }
80 /**
81 * Returns the c-coefficient in the plane equation: a*x+b*y+c*z+d=0. */
82 T c() const { return c_; }
83 /**
84 * Returns the free member of the plane equation: a*x+b*y+c*z+d=0. */
85 T d() const { return d_; }
86
87 /**
88 * Returns normal. */
89 Normal3D<T> normal() const { return Normal3D<T>(a_,b_,c_); }
90
91 /**
92 * Normalization. */
93 Plane3D<T> & normalize() {
94 double ll = std::sqrt(a_*a_ + b_*b_ + c_*c_);
95 if (ll > 0.) { a_ /= ll; b_ /= ll; c_ /= ll, d_ /= ll; }
96 return *this;
97 }
98
99 /**
100 * Returns distance to the point. */
101 T distance(const Point3D<T> & p) const {
102 return a()*p.x() + b()*p.y() + c()*p.z() + d();
103 }
104
105 /**
106 * Returns projection of the point to the plane. */
107 Point3D<T> point(const Point3D<T> & p) const {
108 T k = distance(p)/(a()*a()+b()*b()+c()*c());
109 return Point3D<T>(p.x()-a()*k, p.y()-b()*k, p.z()-c()*k);
110 }
111
112 /**
113 * Returns projection of the origin to the plane. */
114 Point3D<T> point() const {
115 T k = -d()/(a()*a()+b()*b()+c()*c());
116 return Point3D<T>(a()*k, b()*k, c()*k);
117 }
118
119 /**
120 * Test for equality. */
121 bool operator == (const Plane3D<T> & p) const {
122 return a() == p.a() && b() == p.b() && c() == p.c() && d() == p.d();
123 }
124
125 /**
126 * Test for inequality. */
127 bool operator != (const Plane3D<T> & p) const {
128 return a() != p.a() || b() != p.b() || c() != p.c() || d() != p.d();
129 }
130
131 /**
132 * Transformation by Transform3D. */
133 Plane3D<T> & transform(const Transform3D & m) {
134 Normal3D<T> n = normal();
135 n.transform(m);
136 d_ = -n*point().transform(m); a_ = n.x(); b_ = n.y(); c_ = n.z();
137 return *this;
138 }
139 };
140
141 /**
142 * Output to the stream.
143 * @relates Plane3D
144 */
145 std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream & os, const Plane3D<float> & p);
146
147 /**
148 * Output to the stream.
149 * @relates Plane3D
150 */
151 std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream & os, const Plane3D<double> & p);
152
153} /* namespace HepGeom */
154
155#endif /* HEP_PLANE3D_H */
156
